name: 1920: Telegraphist
description:
Play the enormous part in the Battle of Warsaw, not as a soldier, but as a telegraphist. Jam soviet messages with Morse code and fight back!

1920: Telegraphist is a rhythm arcade war game set in 1920. As a telegraphist, you have to prevent the 4th Soviet Army from receiving orders by jamming Soviet signals, sending to the front the contents of the Book of Genesis. Your mission will be successful if you persevere in the eastern assault or capture essential enemy cities.

All game content is in English, only lines from the Book of Genesis are in Polish for historical correctness and immersion.

A game made within 24 hours for HackYeah 2022, task Game Development #1 - Polish Great Battles. Won 2nd place!

Created by:

  • Mateusz Kusionowicz,
  • Jakub Latuszek,
  • Filip Latuszek,
  • Jan Stokłosa,
  • Damian Śremski,
  • Emil Markiewicz.

GitHub repository (open source): https://github.com/TheMatiaz0/HackYeah2022
